programs.title: Registration & Networking
programs.content: Registration and networking time. Please greet other participants and receive your name tag.
programs.speaker: All

programs.title: Keynote: Future Direction of Technology
programs.content: We discuss the development direction of future technologies such as AI, blockchain, and IoT, and our preparation for them. We explore technology trends and business opportunities together.
programs.speaker: Kim Tech

programs.title: Session 1: AI and Machine Learning
programs.content: We explore the latest AI technologies and real-world applications of machine learning. We cover various AI technologies including deep learning, natural language processing, and computer vision.
programs.speaker: Lee AI

programs.title: Session 2: Cloud Computing
programs.content: We cover the present and future of cloud technology and enterprise cloud migration strategies. We compare major cloud platforms including AWS, Azure, and GCP.
programs.speaker: Park Cloud

programs.title: Session 3: Mobile Development
programs.content: We learn about the latest trends in iOS and Android app development and cross-platform development tools. We cover various technologies including React Native and Flutter.
programs.speaker: Kim Mobile

programs.title: Lunch & Networking
programs.content: We have lunch and networking time. Please freely communicate with other participants and exchange information.
programs.speaker: All

programs.title: Session 7: Web Development Trends
programs.content: We learn about the latest web development technologies and frameworks. We cover frontend technologies like React, Vue, Angular and backend technologies like Node.js and Python.
programs.speaker: Choi Web

programs.title: Session 8: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency
programs.content: We explore the principles of blockchain technology and real-world applications. We cover the latest blockchain trends including smart contracts, DeFi, and NFTs.
programs.speaker: Park Blockchain

programs.title: Session 9: IoT and Smart City
programs.content: We learn about IoT technology and smart city construction. We cover sensor networks, data collection, and real-time monitoring systems.
programs.speaker: Lee IoT

programs.title: Session 10: UI/UX Design
programs.content: We learn about design methodologies centered on user experience and the latest design tools. We cover tool usage including Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD.
programs.speaker: Kim Design

programs.title: Session 14: Data Science
programs.content: We share real-world applications of big data analysis and data science. We learn about data analysis tools and machine learning model building methods.
programs.speaker: Jung Data

programs.title: Session 15: Edge Computing
programs.content: We explore the concept of edge computing and real-world applications. We cover efficient data processing methods between IoT devices and the cloud.
programs.speaker: Park Edge

programs.title: Session 16: Serverless Architecture
programs.content: We learn about the pros and cons of serverless computing and actual implementation methods. We cover serverless platforms like AWS Lambda and Azure Functions.
programs.speaker: Lee Serverless

programs.title: Session 17: Machine Learning Ops
programs.content: We learn about machine learning model deployment and operations. We cover MLOps pipeline construction and model monitoring methods.
programs.speaker: Kim MLOps

programs.title: Session 18: Graph Database
programs.content: We explore the characteristics and applications of graph databases. We cover relational data processing methods using Neo4j, Amazon Neptune, etc.
programs.speaker: Jung Graph

programs.title: Panel Discussion: Future of Technology
programs.content: We discuss the future of technology with experts. We discuss future prospects in various technology fields including AI, blockchain, and quantum computing.
programs.speaker: Panel

programs.title: Panel Discussion: Startup Ecosystem
programs.content: We listen to experts' experiences and advice on startup creation and growth. We discuss from various perspectives including investment, marketing, and technology development.
programs.speaker: Panel

programs.title: In-depth Discussion: Future of Remote Work
programs.content: We discuss the changes brought by remote work after COVID-19 and future prospects. We cover various aspects including collaboration tools, communication, and productivity.
programs.speaker: Panel

programs.title: Panel Discussion: Startup Ecosystem
programs.content: We listen to experts' experiences and advice on startup creation and growth. We discuss from various perspectives including investment, marketing, and technology development.
programs.speaker: Panel

programs.title: Panel Discussion: Digital Transformation
programs.content: We discuss challenges and solutions in the process of enterprise digital transformation. We cover various perspectives including organizational change, technology adoption, and employee education.
programs.speaker: Panel

programs.title: Closing & Networking
programs.content: We wrap up the conference and have a final networking time. Please exchange contact information with other participants and explore future collaboration opportunities.
programs.speaker: All
